text: Easy to Look At is a 1945 American comedy film directed by Ford Beebe and written by Henry Blankfort. The film stars Gloria Jean, Kirby Grant, J. Edward Bromberg, Eric Blore, George Dolenz and Mildred Law. The film was released on August 10, 1945, by Universal Pictures. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Gloria Jean as Judy *Kirby Grant as Tyler *J. Edward Bromberg as Gustav *Eric Blore as Billings *George Dolenz as Antonio *Mildred Law as Helene *Leon Belasco as Phillipe *Maurice Cass as Woolens *The Delta Rhythm Boys as Themselves *The Lyttle Sisters as Themselves ==References== ==External links== * Category:1945 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American comedy films Category:1945 comedy films Category:Universal Pictures films Category:Films directed by Ford Beebe Category:American black-and-white films
title: Easy to Look At
